SEARCH
Package gw.cc.claim.entity

Interface IntakeInteraction

public interface IntakeInteraction
Initiates and tracks progress of a request for more data by way of a Claim Intake secondary flow, primarily from the insured or a claimant. May also hold data gathered during an Intake FNOL.

      KeyableBean getRelatedEntity() throws ClassNotFoundException
      Returns:
      The related entity specified by the RelatedEntityPublicId and RelatedEntityType properties.
      Throws:
      ClassNotFoundException - if the TypeSystem is unable to retrieve the IEntityType from the current RelatedEntityType property.
